fields.name: Whiskey Sour
fields.description: A classic sour cocktail with whiskey, lemon juice, and sugar.
fields.ingrediens: Whiskey, Lemon Juice, Sugar, Egg White
fields.instructon: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass.

fields.name: Margarita
fields.description: A refreshing tequila-based cocktail with lime and triple sec.
fields.ingrediens: Tequila, Lime Juice, Triple Sec, Salt
fields.instructon: Shake with ice and serve in a salt-rimmed glass.
